title: PDIS Line Bot
p: PDIS Line Bot provides Audrey Tang's Calendar to PDIS member, it also sends push message from our other services. Bot also linked with Line Beacon, it send greeting message to us when we entering PDIS office.
detail: PDIS Line Bot provides Audrey Tang's Calendar to PDIS member. We can type 'au cal today', chat bot will return Tang's schedule. Bot also support other format. Like 'yesterday, next Monday, 5/20'
Bot can send push notification, it sends message from other services. Like a reservation system send appointment information to PDIS staff.
This bot also linked with Line Beacon(I got this in Line Dev Day 2016). Bot will send greeting message to us when we entering PDIS office.

title: EWS-Calendar
p: EWS-Calendar sync Microsoft Exchange Data to Google. It also generated api server for our Reservation system and Calendar
detail: EWS-Calendar sync our Microsoft Exchange Server Calendar to Google Calendar. For Reservation system and Calendar, we need to get real time Calendar data. It extracted recent Events in Outlook Calendar to two json files. Public one generated for other api. Private one only provide PDIS Line Bot to access.

title: RealTimeSubtitle
p: A open-source plug-in to display subtitle on OBS Studio
detail: EWS-Calendar sync our Microsoft Exchange Server Calendar to Google Calendar. For Reservation system and Calendar, we need to get real time Calendar data. It extracted recent Events in Outlook Calendar to two json files. Public one generated for other api. Private one only provide PDIS Line Bot to access.

title: Airbox
p: Serverless, using ELK to store and Visualize data.

title: HomeKit Plug-in
p: A open-source HomeKit Plug-in for YeeLight Blue 2(BLE) lightbub
detail: <iframe class='youtube-video' frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; encrypted-media' title='YouTube video player' width='100%' height='400' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/4USDlJZbe20?enablejsapi=1&version=3&'></iframe>
In this sample, I build a plug-in for HomeKit Bridge. Then, I use Siri to control my light.
